metadata.title: CVE-2018-10061 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cacti before 1.1.37 has XSS because it makes certain htmlspecialchars calls without the ENT_QUOTES flag (these calls occur when the html_escape function in lib/html.php is not used).

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
